    The SAMPL challenges

    The long-term roadmap

    Roadmap: Details to be filled in here

    Data donation: In general we seek assistance in obtaining high quality data along the lines described in the roadmap above. Some of the measurements will be conducted in our own laboratories, but for others, we rely on donations of data, internships with industry partners, etc., and we are delighted to have help in this regard. Please contact David L. Mobley at dmobley (you know what symbol) mobleylab.org if you have ideas or can help. Properties of particular interest include log P and log D values (between water and alternate solvents, or between diverse solvents), pKa, solubility, binding to well-understood or simple model systems, and selected protein-ligand binding data.
